titleStmt.title: Astræa redux A poem on the happy restoration & return of His sacred Majesty Charles the Second. By John Driden.
titleStmt.author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.M. for Henry Herringman, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Blew-Anchor, in the lower walk of the New-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf bears royal arms on verso.
C2r line 30 begins "Like glass we clearness mixt". Variant: line begins "And glass-like clearness mixt".
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the Blew-Anchor, in the lower walk of the New-Exchange
